title: pyinstaller with pytorch
body_html:
I want to use pyinstaller my.py (my.py include the code of import torch), when run ./some (after build to exe file), there is an error of unable to find torch_shm_manager
The main problem the torch's file is in '/mypythonloc/site-packages/torch', but the build exe file want to find it in the '/some.py_location/dist/lib'

Could anyone who meet it and deal with it? thank you~
body_text:
I want to use pyinstaller  my.py (my.py include the code of import torch), when run ./some (after build to exe file), there is an error of unable to find torch_shm_manager
The main problem the torch's file is in '/mypythonloc/site-packages/torch', but the build exe file want to find it in the '/some.py_location/dist/lib'
Could anyone who meet it and deal with it? thank you~
body:
I want to use `pyinstaller  my.py` (my.py include the code of `import torch`), when run `./some` (after build to exe file), there is an error of **unable to find torch_shm_manager** 
The main problem the torch's file is in '/mypythonloc/site-packages/torch', but the build exe file want to find it in the '/some.py_location/dist/lib'

Could anyone who meet it and deal with it? thank you~
